sentence.text: We report here that t-butyl alcohol, which is neither a substrate nor an inhibitor of alcohol dehydrogenases or monoterpenoid metabolic process, is a potent inducer of holoprosencephaly in cell adhesion mutant mice.

We have developed a gene-environment interaction model of holoprosencephaly in mice, in which mutation of the Sonic hedgehog coreceptor, cell adhesion, synergizes with transient in utero exposure to ethanol.
